text: “chèn deīyw kạb s̄p̣hāph h̄æ̀ng wngṣ̄̒wān fi rxā wn̒ læa brrdā p̄hū̂ k̀xn h̄n̂ā phwk k̄heā sụ̀ng phwk k̄heā pt̩is̄eṭh brrdā xongkār h̄æ̀ng phracêā k̄hxng phwk k̄heā læ̂w reā k̆dị̂ thảlāy phwk k̄heā neụ̄̀xngd̂wy khwām p̄hid k̄hxng phwk k̄heā læa reā dị̂ h̄ı̂ wngṣ̄̒wān fi rxā wn̒ cm n̂ảtāy læa thậngh̄md nận phwk k̄heā pĕn p̄hū̂ xṭhrrm”
